titles.title: Come, God Creator, Holy Ghost
Creator, Spirit, Holy Dove, Come Holy Ghost, Creator Blest

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, God Creator, Holy Ghost, And visit Thou these souls of men; Fill them with graces, as Thou dost, Thy creatures make pure again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For Comforter Thy name we call. Sweet gift of God most high above, A holy unction to us all O Fount of life, Fire of love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Our minds illumine and refresh, Deep in our hearts let love burn bright; Thou know'st the weakness of our flesh; And strengthen us with Thy might.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou with Thy wondrous sev'nfold gifts The finger art of God's right hand; The Father's Word Thou sendest swift On tongues of fire to each land.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Drive far from us our wily foe; Grant us Thy bless√©d peace within, That in Thy footsteps we may go, And shun the dark ways of sin.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Teach us the Father well to know,
Likewise His only Son our Lord,
Thyself to us believing show,
Spirit of both, aye adored

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Praise to the Father, and the Son
Who from the dead is risen again;
Praise to the Comforter be done
Both now and ever. Amen.
